title: Textile, 1920–30
dimensions:
warp: 32cm (12 1/2") weft, selv. at one side: 47.5cm (18 3/4")
Pattern: Visual unit: height, reconstructed: 34cm (13 1/2")                                      width: 33cm (13")                                             Technical repeat unit: height: unknown                                                            width:  33cm (13")                                  Block mark lined up on selvedge.  Design extends beyond selvedge.          Vertically offset 50/50.                                                   Pattern printed beyond selv.
description: Non-directional pattern with flower on stem with "paisley" petals. 4 colors: 2 oranges, brown, yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. printed
Technique: plain weave. Gift of Teresa Kilham. 1958-88-16.
